backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing a game store with user profiles, game catalog (CRUD operations), role-based access control (admin/user permissions), and blob storage for game images.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report placeholder with no features documented.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and configuration for the Dragon Games Store application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining color schemes, borders, and sidebar styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference to main.tsx for the Dragon Games Store application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component using TanStack Router to define routes for home page and admin panel with shared header/footer layout.
frontend/src/components/AboutUs.tsx: About section component displaying store description, platform availability (PC, PS4, PS5, Xbox), customer statistics (5,600+ customers, 3 years experience), and value propositions with icons.
frontend/src/components/AdminGameForm.ts: Modal form component for adding/editing games with fields for name, price, platform, description, image upload with progress tracking, trailer URL, and sale status toggle.
frontend/src/components/AdminGameList.ts: Admin game management component displaying all games in a grid with edit/delete actions and confirmation dialog for deletions.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying copyright notice and Caffeine.ai attribution link with UTM tracking parameters.
frontend/src/components/GameCard.tsx: Displays a game card with image/video trailer, price, platform badge, description, and action buttons (Buy Now via WhatsApp, admin edit/delete). Supports toggling between image and embedded video trailer on click.
frontend/src/components/GameCatalog.tsx: Renders a searchable catalog of games in horizontal scrollable rows of 4 cards each. Includes loading/error states and search filtering by game name.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Site header with logo, title, login/logout button, and conditional admin panel link. Uses Internet Identity for authentication and displays user role-based UI.
frontend/src/components/ProtectedRoute.t: Route guard component that checks authentication and admin role, displaying appropriate login prompts or access denied messages for non-admin users.
frontend/src/components/UserProfileSetup: Modal dialog for first-time user profile setup, prompting authenticated users to enter their name. Cannot be dismissed until completed.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages the backend actor instance with Internet Identity authentication, initializes access control with admin token, and invalidates dependent queries when actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Provides React Query hooks for user authentication operations: fetching caller role, checking admin status, and getting/saving user profiles.
frontend/src/hooks/useGames.ts: Provides React Query hooks for game CRUD operations: fetching all games, filtering by platform/sale status, and adding/updating/deleting games with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, defining color schemes (white/black theme with blue primary), and custom scrollbar styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the root component with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Protected admin panel page displaying game catalog management with add/edit functionality through AdminGameList and AdminGameForm components.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main landing page showing AboutUs section, GameCatalog, and conditionally displays UserProfileSetup dialog for authenticated users without profiles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage integration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending default theme with custom OKLCH color system, container settings, animations, and typography/container-queries plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking Dragon Games Store deployment request (AR-1) to deploy Draft Version 4 with larger GameCard images and click-to-play video trailers to ICP mainnet.
